metadata.title: USN-5095-1 -- Apache Commons IO vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Apache Commons IO incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5095-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libcommons-io-java-doc - 2.6-2ubuntu0.18.04.1 libcommons-io-java - 2.6-2ubuntu0.18.04.1 No subscription required
